meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Molly Newman Kirby Burnett Bob Powell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6296.

td.p: Molly Newman, a writer and trivia hostess from Portland, Oregon
Kirby Burnett, a poker dealer from Prior Lake, Minnesota
Bob Powell, a network administrator from Fort Walton Beach, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $4,800)

tr.td: COUNTRY GROUPS
CONSTELLATION TRANSLATION
DOMINO'S PIZZA
THAT'S TREASON!
2-LETTER WORDS
THE ARCTIC ENVIRONMENT

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
